sections.title: Golden Legionnaire (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Golden Legionnaire class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Weapon and Armor Proficiency (Golden Legionnaire)
sections.description: Grants proficiency with all simple weapons, martial weapons, armor, and shields.

sections.title: Authoritative Command (Ex) (Golden Legionnaire)
sections.description: As a move action, grants competence bonuses to attack rolls, damage, saves, and AC for the Golden Legionnaire and compliant allies within 30 feet.

sections.title: Defy Danger (Ex) (Golden Legionnaire)
sections.description: Provides scaling bonuses on saving throws against specific dangers like charms, fear, poisons, or creature types.

sections.title: Intercept (Ex) (Golden Legionnaire)
sections.description: Grants a bonus to combat maneuver checks with Stand Still feat and to CMD against Acrobatics checks to move through threatened squares.

sections.title: United Defense (Ex) (Golden Legionnaire)
sections.description: Takes AC penalty to grant adjacent ally dodge bonus to AC as a swift action.

sections.title: Allied Retribution (Ex) (Golden Legionnaire)
sections.description: Gains morale bonuses on attacks and damage against designated adversaries who attack allies within 60 feet.

sections.title: Improved Aid (Ex) (Golden Legionnaire)
sections.description: Increases the bonus provided by the aid another action in combat.

sections.title: Hold the Line (Ex) (Golden Legionnaire)
sections.description: Causes 5-foot steps and withdrawals from threatened adjacent squares to provoke attacks of opportunity.

sections.title: Preemptive Strike (Ex) (Golden Legionnaire)
sections.description: Allows attacks of opportunity against foes moving into any threatened square, once per opponent per day.

sections.title: Retaliate (Ex) (Golden Legionnaire)
sections.description: Grants an attack of opportunity when a threatened creature hits an adjacent ally, once per round.

sections.title: Guardian of Liberty (Ex) (Golden Legionnaire)
sections.description: Once per day as an immediate action, can reroll own attack or save, or force enemy to reroll attack against self or adjacent ally.
